scripts.start: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=development node sandbox/output/script
scripts.backend_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output backend/output/server
scripts.frontend_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output frontend/output/Code
scripts.simpleGit_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output simpleGit/output/index
scripts.sandbox_dev: npm run lint && nodemon -w output sandbox/output/script
scripts.common_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER,NODEMON -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run backend_dev"
scripts.none_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER,NODEMON -c gray,blue "npm run gas" "npm run frontend_dev"
